mapper.select:

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.menu_id AS "menuId", a.name AS "name", a.t_field AS "field", a.t_express AS "express", a.t_value AS "value", a.sql_segment AS "sqlSegment", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM sys_datarule a
a.menu_id =#{id} and a.del_flag = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY a.sort
